scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised of fifty-seven items, 1976-1983, printed material regarding the Colorado Libertarian Party. Included are issues of the Colorado Libertarian Newsletter,1976-1978; issues of Colorado Liberty,1979-1983; an announcement of the Rocky Flats Encirclement to close the Rocky Flats nuclear facility, October 15, 1983; 1983 campaign pamphlets of Libertarian candidates; and newspaper clippings regarding Libertarian candidate Story Mon's 1983 senatorial campaign.
